api.name: outlook
api.description: Outlook.com connector allows you to manage your mail, calendars, and contacts. You can perform various actions such as send mail, schedule meetings, add contacts, etc.

properties.description: Can perform all read, write and delete operations on the registry
Can pull any repository of the registry
Can perform all read operations on the registry
Can push to any repository of the registry
Can perform all read and write operations on the registry
